```{r}
library(shiny)

ui <- fluidPage("Hello World")

server <- function(input, output){
  selectInput(inputId = "player", label = "Choose a Player", 
              choices = paste(data$players, "-", data$team)),
  plotOutput("hist")
  output$hist <- renderPlot()
}

shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```
